namespace.description: Namespace of the object, for scoped objects.

kind.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

name.description: Name of the object, unique within a Namespace for scoped objects.

uri.description: URI is a link to accessing the referenced object.

apiObjectRef.description: ObjectRef contains identifying information about an object.

result.description: Result contains the status of the operation, success or failure.

message.description: Message contains human readable form of the error.

code.description: Code is the HTTP status code.

object-ref.description: Reference to the object (optional) for which this status is being sent.

apiStatus.description: Status is returned for calls that dont return objects.

apiStatusResult.description: StatusResult contains possible statuses for a NIC.
